response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I trust this offer will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
